g.text: Wants to see the product catalog.
Asks if he wants to use filters
[until Sales Clerk don't want to select any more filters or until he selects them all]
Asks which filter he wants to use (Brand, Category, Description or All)
[if the filter is All (Only available in the 1st iteration)]
informs operation success and automatically exits the menu
(When he stops selecting filters) confirms data
